Header: Four suspects in the floating armoury case further remanded
Content: Four suspects including Secretary to the Police Commission Saman Dissanayake have been further remanded. They have been remanded with respect to the maintenance of a floating armoury in the Avant Garde vessel. The suspects including the Secretary to the Police Commission Saman Dissanayake were further remanded until the 20 of this month when they were produced in the Galle Magistrateâ€™s Court. The other suspects in the case are Rakna Lanka Chairman Victor Samaraweera and Retired Major Generals Palitha Fernando and Retired Major General Karunaratne Egodawala.
